name: 李明哲
objective:
此門課程的主要目標，將以介紹高等積體電路設計為主，讓學生了解高等積體電路設計的理論、概念、流程及方法。課程將理論與實際並重，讓學生具有實際的高等積體電路設計能力。
1.Introduction of Advanced VLSI Design
2.Introduction and Use of EDA tools (ADFT 16nm FinFET)
3.Circuit/System simulation
4.Layout drawing/verifications (DRC, LVS, and Post-Layout Simulation)
5.Circuit Design Methodologies & VLSI Testing
schedule:
week  1      Course Introduction
week  2      Process Overview/Design environment/Simulations
week  3      Various Inverters
week  4      Layout/ Laker & Calibre DRC/LVS introduction
week  5      Ring oscillator & Flip-flops
week  6      Techniques of Design-Oriented Analysis
week  7-8    Null Double Injection (NDI) & Extra Element Theorem (EET)
week  9      Mid-term project
week 10      Arithmetic circuits
week 11      Dynamic logic
week 12      Dynamic logic, Memory
week 13      Memory
Week 14-15   VLSI Testing
Week 16      National Holiday
Week 17      National Holiday
week 18      Final project
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 20%
Homework: 20%
Mid-term project: 30%
Final project: 30%
materials:
(1) Sung-Mo. Kang and Yusuf Leblebici, “CMOS Integrated Circuits – Analysis and Design," McGraw-Hill
(2) Jan M. Rabaey, “Digital Integrated Circuits," Prentice Hall
(3) Michael L. Bushnell and Vishwani D. Agrawal, "Essentials of Electronic Testing for Digital, Memory and Mixed-Signal VLSI Circuits," Kluwer Academic Publishers
consultation: (1) 辦公室：綜科 311-1 室 (2) Office Hours: 如系統公告 (3) Email: minglee@ntut.edu.tw
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）
課程是否導入AI: ● 鼓勵學生使用生成式 AI 工具（Encourage students to use generative AI tools）
remarks: (1) 本課程將以英文授課，內容將包含積體電路設計流程中大部分的 tool 使用教學，歡迎有興趣的同學多加利用選修。(2) 電路設計與模擬相關軟體受智慧財產權相關法律所保護，請修課同學們務必遵守保密協定，切勿對軟體之任何相關畫面進行截圖、照相或錄影，亦不可將相關技術文件內所含之內容外洩，以觸法。
